sen.j: 安聖寺（あんせいじ）は京都府京都市北区にあった臨済宗聖一派の寺院。
sen.e: Ansei-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Rinzai Sect located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 1382年（永徳2年）、足利義満が参籠して禅の生活に親しみ、相国寺創建を発願したという。
sen.e: In 1382, Yoshimitsu ASHIKAGA retired to the temple for prayer where he became fond of the Zen lifestyle and vowed to found Shokoku-ji Temple.

sen.j: 安聖寺の建物は聖一派ゆかりの万寿寺や東福寺栗棘庵に移され、跡地に相国寺鹿苑院が設けられた。
sen.e: The Ansei-ji Temple buildings were relocated to the Shoitsu school Manju-ji Temple and Tofuku-ji Temple's Rikkyoku-an sub-temple, following which the Rokuon-in sub-temple of Shokoku-ji Temple was built on the site.
